title: Sen. Ron Johnson Responds To State Of The Union
teaser: The Wisconsin Republican joins us to discuss how the president's address resonated with those in control of Congress.
contentencoded:
Here & Now’s Robin Young speaks with Republican Senator Ron Johnson of Wisconsin to get his reaction to President Obama’s State of the Union Address last night.

  • See the transcript of the president’s address
  • Related: Sen. Ron Johnson: GOP Victory ‘A Serious Responsibility’

Guest

  • Ron Johnson, Republican senator from Wisconsin. He tweets @SenRonJohnson.
